settings.title: Write for Us
settings.subtitle: Get your content featured on our blog and reach over 250,000 monthly visitors.

settings.title: We are accepting guest posts!
settings.text1:
Would you like to get your content featured on our website?

  • Reach over 250,000 monthly users
  • Get featured on a DA 52 website

Requirements: Word limit:

A minimum of 750-800 words.

Plagiarism: Only original content.

We do not support any kind of plagiarism. If the content is plagiarised you will be blocked from our writing path.

Link:  A link to your blog or web page. The link will be permanent and a do-follow attribute will be given. 

Pictures: 1-2 high-quality pictures. These need to be copyright free.

Type of article: Only health-related articles will be published on our website. Check our website for the type of content we already have listed.
settings.text2:
How to get featured:

Do not email us asking to be featured. Instead submit a unique peice of content by email and our moderators will review it.

If the quality of the content is good, then you will be published on our blog within 14 days of submission.

Email: press@welzo.com

settings.title: Authorised by embassies
settings.text: Welzo only works with verified doctors and clinics authorised by embassies such as Harley Medic International.

settings.title: Price matched
settings.text: We price match all of our visa medicals. This guarantees we are the most affordable on the market.

settings.title: Efficient and Fast
settings.text: We offer same day appointments and express results and certificate for visa issuance.

settings.title: We Are The UK's Leading Visa Medical Provider
Where can I book my visa medical?
settings.text: Booking a visa medical is a straightforward process. Simply head to the contact us page by clicking here. Once you complete the contact us form, we will get in touch with you via email within 30 minutes to organise your appointment.

settings.title: How long will the medical take?
settings.text: We offer the most affordable visa medicals on the market. Prices usually start from as low as £49 all the way up to £250 depending on the requirements for your travel destination.

settings.title: How much does a visa medical cost?
settings.text: Depending on your travel destination, the condition for your visa medical will vary. However, the average appointment time is 30 minutes.

settings.title: Are these medicals authorised for work abroad?
settings.text: Yes we work with GMC registered doctors and all of them are registered with the FCO.

settings.title: What tests are carried out with the medical?
settings.text: The tests carried out depend on the country you are travelling to. Each country has its own set of testing requirements, but we are aware of the conditions and will make sure that they comply. These tests usually involve a consultation with our doctors to check your ear, sight, and chest, followed by blood work and potentially an x-ray.
